Reviews.Title: Excellent for the price
Reviews.Author: Albert Martinez "Al_Martinez"
Reviews.Content: The pixels are interlaced as the chip is a CMOS not a CCD, however we use it all the time. The pictures come out great... for the price.

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: S. Nieweg
Reviews.Content: Just what I was looking for. Not complicated to use. I just wish I could get a camera with controls on the left side.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Richard Araiza
Reviews.Content: its vary good if your going for cheap camera that will last a good long time got it yesterday and it fell out of my pocket when i picked up my jacket the skin protected it well, i dont think i need anything better then this.

ProductInfo.Features:
5.0 Megapixel Resolution, 4x Digital Zoom
2.0" Bright TFT LCD Display
16 MB internal memory; Movie clip with Sound
SD Memory Card Compatible; PictBridge compatible
USB Port; 10-seconds self timer; still image compression in JPEG and AVI
ProductInfo.Name: Polaroid 5.1 MP Digital Camera with 2" LCD Screen (Color: Black), A520B
